Body:
Description: We can generate offline temporary password for a computer; however, an error is returned to the client when the OTP is entered to try and use:
"Invalid Authorization Code"
Creating OTP for a user is working as expected.
I have print screens, but the option to attach a file is grayed out and I am not able to attach.

What We've Learned Updated: OTP is not working when selecting it for a computer, but it does for user
this is a known bug
found the server patch that fixes this
Next Steps Updated: schedule a remote session with the customer to apply the server patch
Next Steps Updated: waiting on the customer to schedule a remote session to apply the server patch

What We've Learned Updated: OTP is not working when selecting it for a computer, but it does for user
this is a known bug
found the server patch that fixes this - MP-HWA-EPP4-U0066-M0001
Invitation updated. Attendees: No attendees listed
Invitation updated. Attendees: Iosif Muntean, Tim Ashmore
